start.blurb: Agree to work on Undead Defense

spawn-loot.blurb: Developers can place loot spawn locations in the map, each with its own loot probability table

pick-up-loot.display-name: Players can pick up & drop loot
pick-up-loot.blurb: Proximity prompts in loot items let the user pick it up; the user presses 'G' to drop an item; items are stored as tools in ROBLOX backpack

cap-inventory-slots.blurb: Player can only hold X items in their ROBLOX backpack

loot-stacking.blurb: Some loot items 'stack' in the same item slot, with a limit defined by the specific item

drop-loot-on-death.blurb: When killed, a Player's inventory drops on the ground
